Paragraph: 12,15,30 Here we glued the Nalkylpyrrole-2,5-dione , a strong electron - withdrawing unit , 45 to the thieno [3,4-b]thiophene to bring down the HOMO level.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| ------------ |
| Nalkylpyrrole-2,5-dione |
| strong electron - withdrawing unit |
| HOMO level |
| thieno [3,4-b]thiophene |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| ------------ |
| HOMO level |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties. "Nalkylpyrrole-2,5-dione" and "strong electron - withdrawing unit" are chemical compounds used to bring down the HOMO level, while "thieno [3,4-b]thiophene" is a type of compound (specifically, a heterocyclic compound) that the first compound was attached to.
